fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Unleash a devastating Temporal Strike on a player, bypassing all forms of protection.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each successful Temporal Strike empowers your subsequent attacks, increasing their potency by one tier.
- Failure to execute a Temporal Strike in a night resets your attack boost.
- With each consecutive successful Temporal Strike, your strike gains an additional effect:
- Second Strike: Temporal Acceleration - You gain a one-time ability to target an additional player on the same night.
- Third Strike: Time Shatter - Your attack ignores any immunities or special defenses.
- Fourth Strike: Timewarp Cascade - Your attack will occur at the beginning of the night, preventing any interference or redirection.
- Fifth Strike: Chronomancer's Reckoning - Your attack deals double damage and cannot be healed or protected against.
- Each consecutive failed Temporal Strike grants you insight into the target's role, revealing their exact alignment (Town, Mafia, Neutral) the following night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all criminals and evildoers, ensuring the survival of the town.
